text: ASF Bugzilla sẽ chọn một lời châm biếm ngẫu nhiên cho tiêu đề trên mỗi danh sách lỗi.
creator: x2lo@yahoo.com

text:
(In reply to comment #0)
> [ASF Bugzilla should choose a random satire title on every error list.]

Bugzilla supports this directly, but ASF has apparently not enabled it because it's merely an entertainment feature and another vector for spam.
creator: chris@christopherschultz.net
